title: Youngkhngdiddy
author: Youngkhngdiddy
content: Artificial Intelligence also know as AI is a software system based on neural networks, founded by John Mccarthy  together with other computer scientists, it's aslo said to be the stimulation of human intelligence processes by machines especially computer. And currently have many benefits, to mention a few such as 1. Used to generate images for social media post and presentations.2. easily used to summarized articles and save time of research.3. better transformation of written contents to videos for marketing and e-learning.4. faster creation of logos, banners, book covers, for businesses and industries.5. It's also beneficial to crypto currency, by enhancing it's security and improved efficiency. Do you think it has more disadvantages than its advantage, my odds are the benefits are greater, what's your say on this?

And currently have many benefits, to mention a few such as 1. Used to generate images for social media post and presentations.2. easily used to summarized articles and save time of research.3. better transformation of written contents to videos for marketing and e-learning.4. faster creation of logos, banners, book covers, for businesses and industries.5. It's also beneficial to crypto currency, by enhancing it's security and improved efficiency. Do you think it has more disadvantages than its advantage, my odds are the benefits are greater, what's your say on this?More powerful the tool, more powerful can be the benefits of it, but that goes also with the destructive power of it, as governments will try use it to destabilize other governments.I wouldn't count any of your points as real "benefits" for humankind, except maybe security and learning. I would see more interesting how it could (in the future) deal with big constructs of data and find patterns people are missing out. Similar to comparing google trends but with a huge capacity to do that with all areas. I see it being used in fields of medicine, logistics, psychology, game theories, planning cities, planning for economies, and even designing more efficient and fair, progressive and sustainable models for government.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Depends on the person that looks at it. If a business is becoming more productive with the use of it then that's a good thing for them because they're automating the process and the way they get leads and other stuff that they need. It saves them time, money, and effort. While looking at the perspective that it is replacing people's jobs, these jobs are also going to upgrade and will require them to be more knowledgeable with AI. AIs have been there for a long time and I've firstly used them with games and I know that people understand what I am talking about if it's with the games.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Youngkhngdiddy on June 10, 2023, 01:10:21 AMArtificial Intelligence also know as AI is a software system based on neural networks, founded by John Mccarthy  together with other computer scientists, it's aslo said to be the stimulation of human intelligence processes by machines especially computer. And currently have many benefits, to mention a few such as 1. Used to generate images for social media post and presentations.2. easily used to summarized articles and save time of research.3. better transformation of written contents to videos for marketing and e-learning.4. faster creation of logos, banners, book covers, for businesses and industries.5. It's also beneficial to crypto currency, by enhancing it's security and improved efficiency. Do you think it has more disadvantages than its advantage, my odds are the benefits are greater, what's your say on this?AI tools just like other technological tools are invented to make tasks faster and easier. They also carry out tasks that are deemed monotonous and complex. As an academic, it has assisted me in research, student evaluation, student/parent feedback, attendance recording and computation, online learning, language translation, lesson planning and delivery, test and examination assessment and records, plagiarism check, etc. Our students have also benefited from this technology because it also said them in carrying out thier academic activities. One of the major challenges we are facing in the academic field is using these tools to cheat. Students have become too lazy to carryout research to find solutions to assignments and tests because they solely rely on these tools. Artificial intelligence tools are designed to assist humans and not to perform the entire task. There is always a need to revise, evaluate and review the outputs from these tools because they will always give out answers like machines. So in a few years, we are predicting that if not checked these machines will reduce innovation and creativity in students.

comments.body: Quote1. Used to generate images for social media post and presentations.No need for it, Humans can do this already, its called art and or designQuote2. easily used to summarized articles and save time of research.No need for it, Humans can do this already - why is easier better? we actually need to excersize our brains.Quote3. better transformation of written contents to videos for marketing and e-learning.No need for it, Humans can do this already - how would AI do it "better"?Quote4. faster creation of logos, banners, book covers, for businesses and industries.No need for it, Humans can do this already - does it really need to be done faster?Quote5. It's also beneficial to crypto currency, by enhancing it's security and improved efficiency.How the hell did Satoshi design Bitcoin without AI??? seems "impossible" for Satoshi to have done it.As you can see I am not a fan of AI, I think it will definitely reduce the need to employpeople. All these jobs which a lot of you think will be great to get AI involved in doesnot enhance our lives.The one area which could benefit us is in medicine.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I think we gonna realized its disadvantage when they start to create robots with the power of AI that will gonna destroy humanity, that's not impossible though we have only seen it in a movie, we might gonna see it sooner because of how they focus to continue developing the power of AI and they will also eventually succeed on using it as a deadly militarized weapons. But right now let's just enjoy the benefits it gives and the convenience it does for the complicated jobs we have in this world. I'm pretty sure as of now, everyone is thankful to witness such kinds of future only those people who lost their jobs due to it will curse it.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: On a general terms, artificial intelligence is very beneficial to the society, because it brings about doing thing in a new and easier way, there's more efforts used in making some particular task and in getting them done, but we have to be very mindful of the areas where this could be made applicable abd also not to use it as against some areas where it needs may not be necessary in other not to cheat against others while using it.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: AI has a great impact on the society positively,due to the fact that it makes work easy and done faster,it does things accurately without manipulation. It has been noticed that AI are more efficient than human in carrying out operations and this has made some companies to replace human jobs with AI. Anything that has an advantage also has a disadvantage,AI can't reason like human and can't think fast or can involve in conversations and get quick answers to resolve problems on ground. I hope that in the nearest future,AI governments or the programmers wouldn't use it to hurt the society. It also makes human not to use their brains anymore to make researches for a better understanding.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: AI were created mainly for the advantages that they can provide, it is too late to try to stop AI's because of any disadvantage presently. There are simple disadvantages that can easily be identified now, but as time goes on, some more disadvantages will emerge. AI technology will become normal soon, and no matter how much disadvantages are examined, it will not take them away because that is what change is about. My expectations for developers of this technology is that they make it really safe and ensure that it is not given too much control. If used in an industry, qualified humans should head over them and be able to control them.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: There are so many benefits of AI that can benefit the comments in a big way. This is a matter of time and how we want it. Very soon, artificial intelligence would be use to conduct making research and can also be use to commit crime. This is a versatile and broad technology that we can use to do so many things that we might not know now.
